医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究进展寻找血液测试来识别与疾病相关的大脑变化约翰霍普金斯大学儿童中心领导的一项研究使用了来自人类血液和实验室培养的脑细胞的遗传物质，研究人员表示，他们在开发血液测试以识别与产后抑郁症和其他精神疾病特别相关的大脑疾病相关变化方面取得了进展。和神经系统疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-advances-search-for-a-blood-test-to-identify-disease-linked-changes-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-advances-search-for-a-blood-test-to-identify-disease-linked-changes-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eed51600-c9c6-44ff-9c97-01e67d89c333 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 10:22:00 -0500 Study advances search for a blood test to identify disease-associated changes in the brain
研究发现大脑与其周围环境之间存在直接联系在最近一项关于大脑废物排出系统的研究中，圣路易斯华盛顿大学的研究人员与美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 下属的国家神经疾病和中风研究所 (NINDS) 的研究人员合作，发现了一种大脑与其坚硬的保护层硬脑膜之间有直接联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-discovers-a-direct-connection- Between-the-brain-and-its-surrounding-environment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-discovers-a-direct-connection- Between-the-brain-and-its-surrounding-environment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35a940a9-f14d-43ae-b07b-39fea58e96b2 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 09:59:54 -0500 Study discovers a direct connection between the brain and its surrounding environment
父母特征为预测儿童神经发育障碍提供了新线索预测自闭症或精神分裂症等神经发育和精神疾病的轨迹很困难，因为它们可能受到许多不同遗传和环境因素的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Parental-traits-offer-new-clues-to-predicting-neurodevelopmental-disorders-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Parental-traits-offer-new-clues-to-predicting-neurodevelopmental-disorders-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17396430-8024-4a38-b15e-088780c21d4d Thu, 08 Feb 2024 09:18:51 -0500 Parental traits offer new clues to predicting neurodevelopmental disorders in children
无线可穿戴设备持续监测用户耳垂温度智能配件越来越普遍。戒指和手表可以追踪生命体征，而雷朋眼镜现在配备了摄像头和麦克风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Wireless-wearable-continuously-monitors-users-earlobe-Temperature.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Wireless-wearable-continuously-monitors-users-earlobe-Temperature.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d306a577-3dfd-402c-a519-d2f16035286f Thu, 08 Feb 2024 09:14:49 -0500 Wireless wearable continuously monitors user's earlobe temperature
在紧缩政治时代，英国最年长成年人的衰弱加剧一项新的研究表明，在英国政府实行紧缩政治的时代，英国最年长的成年人变得更加虚弱的速度加快了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Frailty-among-Englands-oldest-adults-accelerated-during-the-era-of-austerity-politics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Frailty-among-Englands-oldest-adults-accelerated-during-the-era-of-austerity-politics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=238dbf01-9bca-4d3e-b643-867f84f8231d Thu, 08 Feb 2024 09:09:59 -0500 Frailty among England's oldest adults accelerated during the era of austerity politics
饮用水质量对心理健康的影响和饮食的调节作用研究人员估计，接触饮用水中的各种微量元素会如何增加抑郁和焦虑的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/The-impact-of-drinking-water-quality-on-mental-health-and-the-modifying-role-of-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/The-impact-of-drinking-water-quality-on-mental-health-and-the-modifying-role-of-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50e93e24-38b5-4ee7-a3d3-824df50f1f11 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 08:31:00 -0500 The impact of drinking water quality on mental health and the modifying role of diet
精神疾病与已知的痴呆遗传风险之间的关系研究人员在英国生物银行 (UKB) 的大型纵向人群队列中调查了痴呆前精神诊断与公认的痴呆遗传风险因素之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/The-relationship- Between-psychiatric-disorders-and-known-genic-risks-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/The-relationship- Between-psychiatric-disorders-and-known-genic-risks-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b81fdb6f-fa62-4170-9d61-ddc68f64fc42 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 08:24:00 -0500 The relationship between psychiatric disorders and known genetic risks of dementia
研究追踪了慢性危重 COVID-19 患者出院几个月后的健康状况和生活质量研究人员调查了因 SARS-CoV-2 严重感染而寻求入住 ICU 并接受机械通气的 COVID-19 幸存者的慢性危重疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-tracks-health-and-quality-of-life-in-chronically-riticly-ill-COVID-19-患者-months-after-hospital-放电.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-tracks-health-and-quality-of-life-in-chronically-riticly-ill-COVID-19-患者-months-after-hospital-放电.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9adecce4-f6a2-43bf-9db1-1f10e6ad2ccf Thu, 08 Feb 2024 08:07:00 -0500 Study tracks health and quality of life in chronically critically ill COVID-19 patients months after hospital discharge
印度过早绝经：触发因素是什么？ 《科学报告》上发表的一项研究根据 2019-2021 年全国家庭健康调查探讨了印度过早和提前绝经的诱因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Premature-and-early-menopause-in-India-what-are-the-triggers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Premature-and-early-menopause-in-India-what-are-the-triggers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87798de8-779a-4e74-9caa-e173f33a84ae Thu, 08 Feb 2024 06:59:00 -0500 Premature and early menopause in India: what are the triggers?
英国 ELRIG 宣布 Steve Bates 和 Anderson Ryan 博士担任 2024 年研究与创新大会的主讲人英国欧洲实验室研究与创新小组 (ELRIG) 今天公布了即将于 3 月 20 日至 21 日在曼彻斯特大学举行的研究与创新会议的主讲嘉宾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/ELRIG-UK-announces-Steve-Bates-and-Dr-Anderson-Ryan-as-keynote-speakers-at-Research-and-Innovation-2024。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/ELRIG-UK-announces-Steve-Bates-and-Dr-Anderson-Ryan-as-keynote-speakers-at-Research-and-Innovation-2024。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=288081aa-c793-4c61-b3f1-a858b8098e4f Thu, 08 Feb 2024 06:46:00 -0500 ELRIG UK announces Steve Bates and Dr Anderson Ryan as keynote speakers at Research and Innovation 2024
